message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I've already made a significant concession by offering it to you at $180. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $160, Bob. However, I'm willing to give you a small discount for being a serious buyer. I'll meet you at $155, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to give me a discount, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?

I've already given you a significant discount, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $155, but I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a free accessory that's worth $20, so the total value you'll get is $175. I'll still sell it to you for $155.
I appreciate the offer of the free accessory, but I'm still not willing to pay $155. Would you be willing to consider a price of $135?

I'm not going to budge on the price, Bob. I've already given you a great deal with the free accessory. I'll tell you what - I'll throw in another accessory, worth $10, on top of the first one. That's a total of $30 in extras. I'll still sell it to you for $155.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $155. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $135 and $155. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $145?
